short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculate prices quickly when you want to buy hair extension products
short.vi: Tính giá nhanh khi muốn mua các sản phẩm phần mở rộng tóc

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Hair Extensions application on Google Chrome is a utility tool with the following features:

Quick price calculation: Based on the quantity you want to buy hair products, help you know the estimated price.

Quick check of product categories: Supports product categories like Twist Curly Dark Brown Invisible Tape, Light Color Loose Curly Long, Bouncy Wavy Black Flat-Tip, Water Body Wavy, Deep Wavy Black Invisible, Fumi Curly.

Show Lowest, Highest, Color: Provides information on the lowest and highest prices of products along with color options.

Contact application suggestions at:
- Address: Floor 6, No. 24 Nguyen Co Thach street, Cau Dien Ward, Nam Tu Liem Dist, Hanoi Vietnam
- Phone number: +84862081388
- Email: Oscarhair.vn@gmail.com
